trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Macon
There were no other sightings in Macon on or around December 1st 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsa row of 4 or more glistening star like lights took a slight right hand turn.the lights completely went out with a slightly red after glow as it made its way behind cloud cover .i can tell you this was no airplain i have 2 other witnesses that saw it at the same time i did.
